item.title: How to Run CryptoNets in 2022
item.description: Introduction More and more companies have built applications based on big data techniques in recent years. To have a well-performance model, collecting data has become a must. However, the consciousness of privacy raises in many people’s minds, and they are less willing to give data to companies. As a result, data protection has become a vital technique to balance the dilemma between big data and data privacy. In 2016, Microsoft Research published CryptoNets [1], the first paper to infer a CNN model in the encrypted domain.
